answers.answer: It is possible this would help, yes. Massage will also help, and manipulation (bending and stretching the legs gently) How is is exercise tolerance? If not so bad, and he doesn't have arthritis, disk problems or any painful condition, then 3 short gentle walks a day, gradually building up day by day till he can go a mile each walk, will also help re-build muscle and tendon strength. If he's up to it, running will, and any games such as frisbee, ball etc.But I would advise you talk to your vet about any exercise program first. Just in case there are any contra-indications.
